content.question: Do you want to name the person you believe your {{ divorceWho }} committed adultery with?
content.noBenefit: You don't have to name this person, and naming them usually doesn't benefit an application for divorce.
content.provideAddress: If you do name them you must provide their full name and address so that they can respond.
content.delayed: Your divorce will take longer and could cost more if they don't respond.
content.costs: You can ask the court to order them to pay some or all of your divorce costs.
content.mustProvideAddress: You must provide their full name and address so the court can send them a copy of your divorce application.

content.question: A ydych chi eisiau enwi’r unigolyn yr ydych yn credu bod eich {{ divorceWho }} wedi godinebu ag ef/hi?
content.noBenefit: Nid oes raid ichi enwi’r unigolyn, ac fel rheol ni fydd gwneud hynny’n cynorthwyo cais am ysgariad.
content.provideAddress: Os byddwch yn enwi’r unigolyn, mae’n rhaid ichi ddarparu enw a chyfeiriad llawn yr unigolyn er mwyn iddo/iddi ymateb.
content.delayed: Bydd eich ysgariad yn cymryd mwy o amser a gallai gostio mwy os na fydd yn ymateb.
content.costs: Gallwch ofyn i'r llys orchymyn iddo/iddi dalu rhywfaint o gostau eich ysgariad neu holl gostau eich ysgariad.
content.mustProvideAddress: Rhaid ichi ddarparu enw a chyfeiriad llawn yr unigolyn er mwyn i’r llys allu anfon copi o'ch cais am ysgariad ato/ati.
